name: Garlic-Cayenne Pumpkin Seeds
author: Angie
summary: I love pumpkin seeds and craved spicy food while I was pregnant so… I put the two together and this is what I got! I'm not pregnant and still crave them!
ingredients: ¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper, or to taste
directions: Preheat the oven to 250 degrees F (120 degrees C)
Clean pumpkin seeds, making sure there is as little pumpkin debris as possible
Pat seeds dry and place in a bowl
Add melted butter, garlic salt, and cayenne pepper; stir until evenly coated
Transfer to a baking sheet, spread in an even layer, and sprinkle a light layer of salt over top
Bake in the preheated oven, stirring occasionally, until dry and golden brown, about 1 hour
